The film tells the story of a cynical expatriate cafe owner struggling to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco. With a talented cast including Claude Rains, Humphrey Bogart, and Conrad Veidt, this movie is sure to captivate you from start to finish.

Alternatively, if you're looking for something a bit more modern and action-packed, then "The Warlords" might be the perfect choice. This 2007 Chinese epic follows two bandit leaders who form an army with eyes on rebel-held Suzhou and Nanjing, and features some incredible fight scenes and stunning visuals. With a talented cast including Andy Lau, Takeshi Kaneshiro, and Jet Li, this movie is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.
